mapper.select: select t.id as id,t.editTime as editTime,t.name as name,cus.name as customerId,t.stage as stage,t.money as money, t.createTime as createTime,u2.name as createBy,t.description as description, t.expectedDate as expectedDate, a.name as activityId,t.description as description, t.contactSummary as contactSummary,t.nextContactTime as nextContactTime, u3.name as editBy, t.type as type,u.name as owner,t.source as source,con.fullname as contactsId from tbl_tran as t left join tbl_user as u on t.owner = u.id left join tbl_customer as cus on t.customerId = cus.id left join tbl_contacts as con on t.contactsId = con.id left join tbl_activity as a on t.activityId = a.id left join tbl_user as u2 on t.createBy = u2.id left join tbl_user as u3 on t.editBy = u3.id where t.id = #{id}
